messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services, will put more police on patrol, restore the pensions' earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces.

messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats run many of our biggest cities including Liverpool, Sheffield, and Bristol. More votes than Labour in the last elections. Can deliver real change across Britain today.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Kevin believes the NHS would not be safe in Conservative hands, refers to a current MP attacking the Health Service, and implies a stance against NHS privatisation.
Will put more police on patrol.
Promises to restore the pensions' earnings link.
Pledge to deliver fair pay for the armed forces.
Nick Clegg's tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn, cutting most tax bills by £700.

issues.economy: Nick Clegg's tax plan aims for fairer taxes and to put money back in your pocket.
issues.governance: The Liberal Democrats can deliver real change across Britain today.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services and have identified real savings to pay for it.

leaflet.personalStatement: Kevin was born into a British Army family and has been an active local campaigner for many years, fighting to win change for local people at the last elections.

contactInformation.address: Wellingborough and Rushden LibDems, FREEPOST NH0842, NN1 3BR

quotes.text: "We've lived through this mistake for 60 years now... The reality is it [the NHS] hasn't worked - it has made people iller..."
quotes.source: Senior Conservative MEP Dan Hannan, Summer 2009

quotes.text: Tory Health spokesman accepted £21,000 donation from private health firm
David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners
Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS

images.caption: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats winning support across Britain.
